job.title: Machine Learning Infrastructure Engineer
job.description: <br><strong>Summary<br></strong> <br>Apple is looking for Machine Learning/Deep Learning infrastructure engineers to develop infrastructure for various ML/DL applications. Your work will enable researchers and engineers to build production ML/DL models at scale. Join Apple and help us leave the world better than we found it!<br><br><br>WHAT YOU’LL DO<br><br>- Develop highly scalable and reliable machine learning infrastructure that can perform model training and evaluation on a massive scale.<br><br>- Build vital tools and infrastructure to monitor and understand the performance of complex systems.<br><br>- Support the team to deploy models in a mission critical environment.<br><br> <br><strong>Key Qualifications<br></strong> <br>Strong background in building scalable and fault-tolerant distributed systems. Ideal candidates have past experience in building applications such as data pipelines, data caching/storage systems, and/or RPC services.<br><br>Strong programming background, with extensive experience in Python. Experience with C++ is a plus.<br><br>Familiarities with gRPC, ML model deployments, Ray, Spark, full-stack web developments are a plus.<br><br>Previous experience with developing machine learning infrastructure or experience in using GPUs is a plus.<br><br> <br><strong>Description<br></strong> <br>You’ll join a phenomenal team of hardworking engineers and researchers with deep experience in robotics, machine learning, and software engineering. We hope you’re excited about the values that drive us:<br><br>- Passion for the mission: We’re here to make something great. We take on whatever work is right for the product and strive for the best possible results.<br><br>- Modesty: The right answer is more important than being right. We search for solutions as a team and value clear-eyed feedback.<br><br>- Lean habits: You can’t grow without limits. Time constraints and big goals encourage us to sharpen our focus and learn to make great decisions.<br><br> <br><strong>Education &amp; Experience<br></strong> <br>Bachelors, Masters, or PhD Degree in Computer Science or equivalent professional experience.<br><br> <br>Role Number: 200174899<br><br>
